text: Do you need analytics for your blog?

options.text: Yes, but privacy-friendly only (no precise tracking)
options.reason: Privacy-friendly analytics tools don't use cookies and you may lose some insights. However, they are more respectful of your visitors privacy.
Precise tracking requires cookies and may impact privacy. We'll focus on tools that provide detailed analytics.
I guess, we don't really need to ask you more questions then :)

text: What is your monthly budget for your blog?

options.reason: Some tools can provide a free tier but most of the time, free means that you have to host it yourself

text: What level of statistics and analytics do you want?

options.text: Basic - Visit counts and traffic sources
Advanced - Blog analytics (engagement, outliers detection etc...)
